resources.string: Kreuzviertel (Kreuz Quarter) is a neighbourhood in the city named by Heilig-Kreuz-Kirche (Holy Cross Church) with its borders at Hohe Straße, Sonnenstraße, Lindemannstraße and Rheinlanddamm (B1). From the 1970s onwards it is dominated by students because of the university and the low rent costs at that time. Still today you can find a multifaceted scene with bars,restaurants and cafés.
